Question
========

Take one chip from a closed box that contains 20 chips. The chips are numbered from 1 to 20. *A* is the event that the number on the randomly selected chip is divisible by 3 ***or*** by 4. How large is the probability of event *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/20
* 1/10
* 1/2
* 11/20

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/20: Incorrect
* 1/10: Incorrect
* 1/2: Correct
* 11/20: Incorrect
